pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Stability Analysis of Genotype by Environment Interaction (GEI) // Performs general Bayesian estimation method of linearbilinear models for genotype environment interaction. The method is explained in Perez-Elizalde, S., Jarquin, D., and Crossa, J. (2011) (doi:10.1007/s13253-011-0063-9).
